title: sEdi onru kandaniDam
sahitya:
sEdi onru kandaniDam shenru kUri vADi sakhiyE nAthan avan ninaindE nalindiDurEn enra


anupallavi

  kAdalitta mAdai oru mAdamAi marandavaLai vEdanaip-paDavE viDum bAdhakam AghAdu enra


caraNam 1    cancalam minjiDa sankaTam pongiDa nenjam ayara nAn neDu mUcc-erindiDa
tanjam enravanai kenjugirEn enrum konjam karuNaik-kUra kOruginrEn enrum
    caraNam 2    mAdu enadu sArbAga neriyai bOdhikka mEdini mIdil yArum mun varAda pOdum nAn 
sUdum vAdum ariyAda pEdaiyAna pOdilumE AdimUla nAthan kAdil mOda muraiyiDuvEn enra
